name: Vinicius Ximenes
about_text: Web developer with solid experience in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. I use Figma for interface design, developed Front-End projects with React.js, and Full Stack projects with React.js and Node.js (Express/Nest.js). For styling, I apply everything from plain CSS to Sass, Styled Components, and Tailwind. I have practical experience with databases using Firebase, PostgreSQL, and Prisma.

project_details.title: Sale No Mi
project_details.description: Landing page created to promote the sale of akuma no mi (fictitious fruit from the anime One Piece). Created using React.Js and Sass
